Reviews.Title: “Wife visiting while I work in Dubai”
Reviews.Author: edchapman59
Reviews.Content: stayed 9 nights february 1bedroom apartment size excellent double bedroom plus dining plan sofa tv dvd player equipped kitchen plus balcony nice pool am staying march recommend price

Reviews.Title: “Overpriced and out of the way”

Reviews.Content: hour check recepionist system booked 3 months advance extend stay 2 days pay bill striaght paid bill bill 2 days twice amount original bill pay checked hotel worth money paid huge appliances installed kitchen trying positive

Reviews.Title: “Great Value for Money with 4/5 star Quality”
Reviews.Author: Sam B
Reviews.Content: lived park hotel 45 decided visit dubai leisure remembered amazing lovely spacious huge bed little kitchen living balcony lovely views oriental style amazing rates week dec miss exclusively executive apartments term style live entered short term quality building fantastic 1850 aed 4 nights 1 bed apartment unheard dubai considering 4 star maybe 5 star quality hotel yes location little beaten track taxis cheap offer free shuttle buses various dubai locations throughout day weeks car hire location isnt bad considering theres 30 wafi centre restaurants bars returned exactly remembered hadnt changed viewed bad 45 signs wear tear etc 1 bed appartment 606 fantastic couldnt fault quality clean kitchen nice views city facing despite requesting front facing restaurant kitchen own breakfast dinner bar hotel door arabian park hotel aswell restaurant deli pool sun day towels supplied bottle water handed pool opinion signs run tiles pool day replacing theres electric extension lead running pool obviously powering makeshift safe cover wires pipes coming isnt attractive pool isnt heated cold winter months staff helpful security guard little top partner entering hotel aggressive manner partner told replied havent seen bit rude staff ok 4 star hotel value hotel looking quality low price dont location pool bit little hidden gem dubai

Reviews.Title: “One of the best places I have stayed in while in Dubai”
Reviews.Author: Rethabile M
Reviews.Content: online bookings manager name josephine rude towards called clarification stayed hotel business elswhere rest staff reception amazing informed touristy friendly warm people hotel clean available impressed standard facilities cleanliness service hotel little transport easily available walk metro call taxi inexpensive hotel brand am pick person advise trust judgement stay dubai

Reviews.Title: “Comfy & relaxing place - good value”
Reviews.Author: Amal_Jaffar
Reviews.Content: loved stayed 1bed apartment boyfriend weekend 3 nights comfortable relaxing stay check easy staff friendly apartment spacious kitchen equipped entertainment system bathroom toilet clean warm feeling loved taking hot showers baths balcony overlooking garden downstairs city skyline lovely sitting looking sky stars night lot hotel location 1015 minutes sh zayed road festival city wafi airport 30 coupons wafi restaurants saved chunk money paying dinner bill hotel food ok dont expect quiet stay floor noise whatsoever simply loved definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Great room, food average”
Reviews.Author: Buckingtonroo
Reviews.Content: facilities comfortable stay trip park middle undeveloped parcel land freeways cant walk taxi hotel bus food average expensive £3 taxi ride festival city shops restaurants offering value choice park hotel unlicensed adjacent arabian park hotel bar smoky expat drowning wifi availabel lobby chargeable internet accessed via short lan cable bedroom living

Reviews.Title: “Elegance & luxury meets genuine hospitality”
Reviews.Author: Dukes-UAE
Reviews.Content: stay park hotel apartments absolutely marvelous value money 1 bedroom suite spotless extremely equipped highend furniture fittings guests amenities outdoor pool gym fast internet connectivity employees helpful delivering personalized service attention detail return soon highly recommend property

Reviews.Title: “the place was awesome!”
Reviews.Author: flexywheng
Reviews.Content: celebrated birthday park apartment feels im home kitchen facilities spacious living dining food preparation successful biggest cleanest hotel apartments intercontinental breakfast excellent love stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel,fantastic staff!”
Reviews.Author: Cari21
Reviews.Content: time staying hotel lovely clean crisp excellent bedroom bathroom space separate living mini kitchen food staff friendly helpfuli definitely stay
